author: Minetest
long_description:
Minetest Game (abbreviated MTG) is a simple and peaceful sandbox game, with no real goals or built-in enemy mobs.

While it provides a basic gameplay experience out of the box, it is best played with mods. 

Minetest Game is currently in maintenance-only mode, meaning it will not see new gameplay features or anything else that breaks compatibility (See [#2710](https://github.com/minetest/minetest_game/issues/2710)).

## Features
### Overview
- Over 200 node types to mine and built (See [Nodes](https://wiki.minetest.net/Games/Minetest_Game/Nodes) for an overview)
- Deep underground with 7 different [minerals](https://wiki.minetest.net/ores) and [lava](https://wiki.minetest.net/lava)
- 6 [tool](https://wiki.minetest.net/Tool) strengths from wood to diamond
- [Creative mode](https://wiki.minetest.net/Creative_mode) in which (almost) all items are instantly available

### The world
- Several [biomes](https://wiki.minetest.net/Biomes) to discover: Grasslands, desert, jungle, ocean, savannah, decidious forests, coniferous forests, snow, cold desert, glacier
- Underground dungeons
- Small and large underground caves
- Underground [lava](https://wiki.minetest.net/Lava) pockets
- 7 [minerals](https://wiki.minetest.net/Ores): coal, iron, copper, tin, gold, mese and diamond, used to craft tools and stuff
- Rare [mese block](https://wiki.minetest.net/Mese_Block) very deep in the earth (equals 9 [mese crystals](Mese_https://wiki.minetest.net/Crystal))
- 5 [tree](https://wiki.minetest.net/Trees) species: apple tree, jungle tree, acacia tree, aspen tree, pine tree. Includes saplings to grow new trees
- 8 [flowers](https://wiki.minetest.net/Flowers) (used to create colors), [waterlily](https://wiki.minetest.net/Waterlily), mushrooms and some other small plants

### Craftable tools
-   Tools to destroy blocks: [Pickaxe](https://wiki.minetest.net/Pickaxe) (for stones), [shovel](https://wiki.minetest.net/shovel) (for dirt and sand), [axe](https://wiki.minetest.net/axe) (for wood and trees), [sword](https://wiki.minetest.net/sword) (for leaves and small plants)
-   Most tools can also be used as melee weapons
-   [Screwdriver](https://wiki.minetest.net/Screwdriver) (used to rotate stuff)
-   [Bucket](https://wiki.minetest.net/Bucket) for collecting liquids like [water](https://wiki.minetest.net/water)
-   See [Items](https://wiki.minetest.net/Items) for more

### Other gameplay aspects 
- Go over the sea with [boats](https://wiki.minetest.net/Boat)
- Build [rails](https://wiki.minetest.net/Rail) and ride in a [cart](https://wiki.minetest.net/Cart) to transport yourself and items
- Use the [furnace](https://wiki.minetest.net/furnace) to [smelt](https://wiki.minetest.net/Smelting) ores to ingots, use ingots to craft new stuff
- Basic [farming](https://wiki.minetest.net/farming): Till [soil](https://wiki.minetest.net/Soil) with a [hoe](https://wiki.minetest.net/Hoe), plant [wheat](https://wiki.minetest.net/Wheat_Seed) and [cotton seed](https://wiki.minetest.net/Cotton_Seed), put [water](https://wiki.minetest.net/Water) nearby and watch them grow
- When a player dies, the player might lose the items in the inventory which can be retrieved from a [bones](https://wiki.minetest.net/Bones) block
- [Fire](https://wiki.minetest.net/Fire)!
- [TNT](https://wiki.minetest.net/TNT) and [gunpowder](https://wiki.minetest.net/Gunpowder)
